short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep yourself Motivated with Motivational Quotes and Achieve your Goals  !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start every search with motivation. This extension presents you with a motivational quote everytime you click on generate quote .

Perform every new click with motivation! This extension will show a new motivational quote every time within the tab you are working! Get motivated and enjoy a new and beautiful looking tab.

"Shower and motivation don't last forever that's why it's recommended daily."
